channel.title: Straightforward script help request
channel.description:
this script: [code]program New; var a, b, c, d, e, f, dynamitebitmap, notime :integer; const TweetyColor = 162275; begin notime := BitmapFromString(84, 14, 'z78DAED98CB929D300C44BF' + '693264C192E7FF7F521CB5B8751C21C61E6E6A36882A8A327E087' + '5AB2DB3EFEBB00EFB3E6FF356EEE33CEEFB344E7FEFDBB41DED4B' + 'B9CA7D5C5E6FD7723DF6E3F6AB5CFB52ECC045CF6ABF36E12E1C0' + 'BD4D345D7A95C07EE36EAB11FB3DFE53A3234B9AB4F66D7580B5F' + '65BA72DF79652DEC93ADBE8EEB7870E664F5617BCD7FE2898D920' + 'AE9DEC2E1764FC4766FBF61BEAE29645CD73D0F28F8EA36762B57' + '8F6D1FDBC731BF9EAFDBA3CD9FF3E74BE7ED4E1FF4D6FD97E61B4' + '6D479578C103DF2246397EF2C8818E7F1B5AC25BE4DB5ABD913DF' + 'E3CC073299ABCBB76558863395D35A9A2162A79698299EAD36B3F' + 'CD1F3758656BE41DBAB9C8226BBE6673320978532BF8E11CB72D6' + '191B90AD34278C554CB4A2E735D652BBD4A0F244F17993279A532' + 'D5436FAA3D92AEE21431D3B211EE6713EB30FD1B1766A54BBF254' + '5FD4F9F65A759D1556D17D91B34125C8BA6C75CF6566908DF2CC0' + 'A11F0BCB8AC2E7A3D71D605ED8D6C273AF224FACF58B136D69CB1' + 'BF335F2A6A5F9DF1F9BFE30E4FE28EC9EC8BD1CE308AB125DBDB9' + '5AD25EB3B3C4146A7714045C1B38C7CA61A547B56C05D63E30C77' + 'ECBDB873544796858A4B0C61551073CA191E5160DD85B3468B3FE' + 'D9E78CEEECBBFFA939C4F2B05A0B600F7938A4E4C3394E9B98FB2' + '2FE573BBDDDFDF531CC5499C172AA4127D882AC1D872FEAABED2E' + 'E89EC60946276C7ACEFF5245680AC2D638D1799A3B11573129D57' + '0CC528EEE3FEBD36CA63DE8CFEFD7AFE844B866F6472964D69251' + 'C6A950C1DAF27AD272B28B5F3AF5144D3ABAC4E4FA8BDC4CBD702' + '16646035BF344AF5272B0A6477A539A8F1AA7A1E8AF4C5FF93B79' + 'EDFAFCFECF2843B57EC194F82CC1D7E8B9F1DD89F33D34F3D8BFF' + '88F08996DA3CBD9E7067E1CC295EC95F4A9E4AC416571256F5C81' + 'A32A4D2876F553B77FED7657F72629C336EF3EB4E5807EDD258CF' + '26E01277908CE1CCD0C893764F7AFF8CB94625B86411AB54E27BA' + 'B3FF6D8638FDDB43FC05D5510'); dynamitebitmap := BitmapFromString(49, 7, 'z78DAB5955992833' + '00C44AF449861FB0C8BEE7FA4D87A9E5433765218127DA81223A4' + '76AB25CCC6E5C7CCE6650C7E1DE7E0B7798DBE5D82E729BEEF9BC' + '66CB2CEFE8C1322F524F7E76CE9A658BD6DE39F6E0B6EEA7E6315' + '8B2987E9F6C44924B540FBDEE66608AF6DEB762B21CF8D5B6B4CE' + '2C151695D98CC39D9556F877F3995D56A96ECFE64031E521547C2' + '53F0286F20AFB5233DD58E682F5EDD14BDBDCA097E9EA2CF2B965' + '4ED8ABA8FBD95FA422D7E9FB35AE56B24D8720D73778D843770EA' + '849EEB6C61463C73CE52812B57DAB75982196E9DF640F62E2CA58' + 'D213BA4B0912EB394D74ABDF013D52AFC9C9BF45A966086EADA23' + '78DBED55D1989E242DF9AEB8320569377A1EAAE75B9A5D84C6AE4' + 'C5F2D4BBA81B53BBBAE81C7F12B33394B47BE38EF0D0634E76E4B' + 'BB2726A9C8BBFCC9897B00EACB178B'); if(findbitmap(dynamitebitmap, a, b))then begin clickmouse(a, b, true) wait(50) if(findcolor(c, d, TweetyColor, 291, 181, 472, 391))then clickmouse(c, d, true) wait(50) end; clickmouse(a, b-40, true) wait(50) repeat if(findcolor(c, d, TweetyColor, 291, 181, 472, 391))then clickmouse(c, d, true) until(findbitmap(notime, e, f)) end.[/code] for this game: http://forums.krazyletter.com/index.php?act=Arcade&do=play&gameid=204 gets this error:
[Runtime Error] : Exception: Canvas does not allow drawing in line 49 in script
help please?

item.title: Straightforward script help request
item.dc:creator: @gokon gokon
item.description:
@gokon wrote:

@Dudeofthed: thanks, i hope this works.
@Rune Hacker: nah it should be ok.

Read full topic

item.title: Straightforward script help request
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

You should really shorten those bitmaps. Bitmaps that big will lag like hell. Make them smaller by shoosing a smaller section of the picture.

Read full topic

item.title: Straightforward script help request
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

How about this script. I had to edit your one above. Besides, i got no error woth your one above. But this might help.[code]program New;

var
a, b, c, d, e, f, dynamitebitmap, notime :integer;
const
TweetyColor = 162275;
Procedure LoadBMPS;
begin
notime := BitmapFromString(84, 14, ‘z78DAED98CB929D300C44BF’ +
‘693264C192E7FF7F521CB5B8751C21C61E6E6A36882A8A327E087’ +
‘5AB2DB3EFEBB00EFB3E6FF356EEE33CEEFB344E7FEFDBB41DED4B’ +
‘B9CA7D5C5E6FD7723DF6E3F6AB5CFB52ECC045CF6ABF36E12E1C0’ +
‘BD4D345D7A95C07EE36EAB11FB3DFE53A3234B9AB4F66D7580B5F’ +
‘65BA72DF79652DEC93ADBE8EEB7870E664F5617BCD7FE2898D920’ +
‘AE9DEC2E1764FC4766FBF61BEAE29645CD73D0F28F8EA36762B57’ +
‘8F6D1FDBC731BF9EAFDBA3CD9FF3E74BE7ED4E1FF4D6FD97E61B4’ +
‘6D479578C103DF2246397EF2C8818E7F1B5AC25BE4DB5ABD913DF’ +
‘E3CC073299ABCBB76558863395D35A9A2162A79698299EAD36B3F’ +
‘CD1F3758656BE41DBAB9C8226BBE6673320978532BF8E11CB72D6’ +
‘191B90AD34278C554CB4A2E735D652BBD4A0F244F17993279A532’ +
‘D5436FAA3D92AEE21431D3B211EE6713EB30FD1B1766A54BBF254’ +
‘5FD4F9F65A759D1556D17D91B34125C8BA6C75CF6566908DF2CC0’ +
‘A11F0BCB8AC2E7A3D71D605ED8D6C273AF224FACF58B136D69CB1’ +
‘BF335F2A6A5F9DF1F9BFE30E4FE28EC9EC8BD1CE308AB125DBDB9’ +
‘5AD25EB3B3C4146A7714045C1B38C7CA61A547B56C05D63E30C77’ +
‘ECBDB873544796858A4B0C61551073CA191E5160DD85B3468B3FE’ +
‘D9E78CEEECBBFFA939C4F2B05A0B600F7938A4E4C3394E9B98FB2’ +
‘2FE573BBDDDFDF531CC5499C172AA4127D882AC1D872FEAABED2E’ +
‘E89EC60946276C7ACEFF5245680AC2D638D1799A3B11573129D57’ +
‘0CC528EEE3FEBD36CA63DE8CFEFD7AFE844B866F6472964D69251’ +
‘C6A950C1DAF27AD272B28B5F3AF5144D3ABAC4E4FA8BDC4CBD702’ +
‘16646035BF344AF5272B0A6477A539A8F1AA7A1E8AF4C5FF93B79’ +
‘EDFAFCFECF2843B57EC194F82CC1D7E8B9F1DD89F33D34F3D8BFF’ +
‘88F08996DA3CBD9E7067E1CC295EC95F4A9E4AC416571256F5C81’ +
‘A32A4D2876F553B77FED7657F72629C336EF3EB4E5807EDD258CF’ +
‘26E01277908CE1CCD0C893764F7AFF8CB94625B86411AB54E27BA’ +
‘B3FF6D8638FDDB43FC05D5510’);
dynamitebitmap := BitmapFromString(49, 7, ‘z78DAB5955992833’ +
‘00C44AF449861FB0C8BEE7FA4D87A9E5433765218127DA81223A4’ +
‘76AB25CCC6E5C7CCE6650C7E1DE7E0B7798DBE5D82E729BEEF9BC’ +
‘66CB2CEFE8C1322F524F7E76CE9A658BD6DE39F6E0B6EEA7E6315’ +
‘8B2987E9F6C44924B540FBDEE66608AF6DEB762B21CF8D5B6B4CE’ +
‘2C151695D98CC39D9556F877F3995D56A96ECFE64031E521547C2’ +
‘53F0286F20AFB5233DD58E682F5EDD14BDBDCA097E9EA2CF2B965’ +
‘4ED8ABA8FBD95FA422D7E9FB35AE56B24D8720D73778D843770EA’ +
‘849EEB6C61463C73CE52812B57DAB75982196E9DF640F62E2CA58’ +
‘D213BA4B0912EB394D74ABDF013D52AFC9C9BF45A966086EADA23’ +
‘78DBED55D1989E242DF9AEB8320569377A1EAAE75B9A5D84C6AE4’ +
‘C5F2D4BBA81B53BBBAE81C7F12B33394B47BE38EF0D0634E76E4B’ +
‘BB2726A9C8BBFCC9897B00EACB178B’);

end;

procedure FindDynamite;
begin
if(findbitmap(dynamitebitmap, a, b))then
clickmouse(a, b, true)
wait(50)
if(findcolor(c, d, TweetyColor, 291, 181, 472, 391))then
clickmouse(c, d, true)
wait(50)
end;

procedure GetNotime;
begin
clickmouse(a, b-40, true)
wait(50)
repeat
if(findcolor(c, d, TweetyColor, 291, 181, 472, 391))then
clickmouse(c, d, true)
until(findbitmap(notime, e, f))
end;

begin
repeat
LoadBMPS;
FindDynamite;
GetNotime;
Until(IsFKeyDown(9))
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Straightforward script help request
item.dc:creator: @gokon gokon
item.description:
@gokon wrote:

this script:

program New; var a, b, c, d, e, f, dynamitebitmap, notime :integer; const TweetyColor = 162275; begin notime := BitmapFromString(84, 14, 'z78DAED98CB929D300C44BF' + '693264C192E7FF7F521CB5B8751C21C61E6E6A36882A8A327E087' + '5AB2DB3EFEBB00EFB3E6FF356EEE33CEEFB344E7FEFDBB41DED4B' + 'B9CA7D5C5E6FD7723DF6E3F6AB5CFB52ECC045CF6ABF36E12E1C0' + 'BD4D345D7A95C07EE36EAB11FB3DFE53A3234B9AB4F66D7580B5F' + '65BA72DF79652DEC93ADBE8EEB7870E664F5617BCD7FE2898D920' + 'AE9DEC2E1764FC4766FBF61BEAE29645CD73D0F28F8EA36762B57' + '8F6D1FDBC731BF9EAFDBA3CD9FF3E74BE7ED4E1FF4D6FD97E61B4' + '6D479578C103DF2246397EF2C8818E7F1B5AC25BE4DB5ABD913DF' + 'E3CC073299ABCBB76558863395D35A9A2162A79698299EAD36B3F' + 'CD1F3758656BE41DBAB9C8226BBE6673320978532BF8E11CB72D6' + '191B90AD34278C554CB4A2E735D652BBD4A0F244F17993279A532' + 'D5436FAA3D92AEE21431D3B211EE6713EB30FD1B1766A54BBF254' + '5FD4F9F65A759D1556D17D91B34125C8BA6C75CF6566908DF2CC0' + 'A11F0BCB8AC2E7A3D71D605ED8D6C273AF224FACF58B136D69CB1' + 'BF335F2A6A5F9DF1F9BFE30E4FE28EC9EC8BD1CE308AB125DBDB9' + '5AD25EB3B3C4146A7714045C1B38C7CA61A547B56C05D63E30C77' + 'ECBDB873544796858A4B0C61551073CA191E5160DD85B3468B3FE' + 'D9E78CEEECBBFFA939C4F2B05A0B600F7938A4E4C3394E9B98FB2' + '2FE573BBDDDFDF531CC5499C172AA4127D882AC1D872FEAABED2E' + 'E89EC60946276C7ACEFF5245680AC2D638D1799A3B11573129D57' + '0CC528EEE3FEBD36CA63DE8CFEFD7AFE844B866F6472964D69251' + 'C6A950C1DAF27AD272B28B5F3AF5144D3ABAC4E4FA8BDC4CBD702' + '16646035BF344AF5272B0A6477A539A8F1AA7A1E8AF4C5FF93B79' + 'EDFAFCFECF2843B57EC194F82CC1D7E8B9F1DD89F33D34F3D8BFF' + '88F08996DA3CBD9E7067E1CC295EC95F4A9E4AC416571256F5C81' + 'A32A4D2876F553B77FED7657F72629C336EF3EB4E5807EDD258CF' + '26E01277908CE1CCD0C893764F7AFF8CB94625B86411AB54E27BA' + 'B3FF6D8638FDDB43FC05D5510'); dynamitebitmap := BitmapFromString(49, 7, 'z78DAB5955992833' + '00C44AF449861FB0C8BEE7FA4D87A9E5433765218127DA81223A4' + '76AB25CCC6E5C7CCE6650C7E1DE7E0B7798DBE5D82E729BEEF9BC' + '66CB2CEFE8C1322F524F7E76CE9A658BD6DE39F6E0B6EEA7E6315' + '8B2987E9F6C44924B540FBDEE66608AF6DEB762B21CF8D5B6B4CE' + '2C151695D98CC39D9556F877F3995D56A96ECFE64031E521547C2' + '53F0286F20AFB5233DD58E682F5EDD14BDBDCA097E9EA2CF2B965' + '4ED8ABA8FBD95FA422D7E9FB35AE56B24D8720D73778D843770EA' + '849EEB6C61463C73CE52812B57DAB75982196E9DF640F62E2CA58' + 'D213BA4B0912EB394D74ABDF013D52AFC9C9BF45A966086EADA23' + '78DBED55D1989E242DF9AEB8320569377A1EAAE75B9A5D84C6AE4' + 'C5F2D4BBA81B53BBBAE81C7F12B33394B47BE38EF0D0634E76E4B' + 'BB2726A9C8BBFCC9897B00EACB178B'); if(findbitmap(dynamitebitmap, a, b))then begin clickmouse(a, b, true) wait(50) if(findcolor(c, d, TweetyColor, 291, 181, 472, 391))then clickmouse(c, d, true) wait(50) end; clickmouse(a, b-40, true) wait(50) repeat if(findcolor(c, d, TweetyColor, 291, 181, 472, 391))then clickmouse(c, d, true) until(findbitmap(notime, e, f)) end.
for this game: http://forums.krazyletter.com/index.php?act=Arcade&do=play&gameid=204
gets this error:

[Runtime Error] : Exception: Canvas does not allow drawing in line 49 in script

help please?
